name: Undead Legion
description:
Lead your undead legions to rage through the land!

Undead Legion is a brand new strategic puzzle game that had never been seen before!


UNIQUE MIX OF MATCH-3 AND STRATEGY
Move your legions to swap tiles. Your legions will be strengthened by combining tiles of the same color.Then use the skill to deal a fatal blow to your enemies.


ASSEMBLE YOUR ULTIMATE UNDEAD ARMY
Wipe out the enemy and flayed them into Skeletons for your undead legions in thrilling tactic gameplay.7 classes, 5 colors, 14 devotions and random ability provide infinite possibilities for the establishment of your undead army.


RANDOM CONTINENT TO EXPLORE
Collect treasure map by winning battles on the random continent. Find out the treasure and gather legendary items.Your army will be more powerful by these legendary items.


SURVIVAL MODE AWAITS YOU
Induct your favorite legions into the Hall of Fame, and challenge the survival mode with them.

UNDEAD LEGION is a premium game with NO ads or in-app purchases, and it does NOT require a permanent internet connection.

You can find more infomation on
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/undeadlegionapp/
